Name: HVAC Simulator
About the game: Want to find out if your passion is in the HVAC field? Want to find out how to fix simple to complex problems with a air conditioner? In this simulation put on the VR headset and find out how to fix a air conditioner without having the fear of frying your unit and having to pay a lot of money for a professional to come out and install a whole new unit.
